description:
"Our firm distinguishes itself not by its size, but by our passion for client service. We understand that clients have alternatives when it comes to legal services and that we have to earn your business and referrals each and every day." — Founding attorney Peter G. Aziz

At the Clifton law firm of Peter G. Aziz & Associates LLC, clients throughout New Jersey can count on receiving the professional, tailored and effective legal services necessary to pursue their goals. Our lawyers understand the importance of taking an honest interest in our clients and their unique objectives. Whether we are representing a large corporation, a small business, a family or an individual, we take pride in diligently seeking the most favorable outcome possible for that client.

Our primary areas of practice include:

  • Medical Malpractice — Brain injuries, birth injuries, surgery errors, physician errors, hospital errors, failure to diagnose and misdiagnosis.
  • Personal Injury — Car accidents, construction accidents, slip & fall, workplace accidents, wrongful death, fractures, burns and more
  • Criminal law — Defense against DUI/drunk driving charges, traffic violation charges and other offenses
  • Landlord-tenant law — Failure to pay rent, lease violations, evictions, disorderly conduct and other disputes
  • Real estate law — Residential and commercial purchases and sales, foreclosure defense and more
  • Franchise law — Formations and divestitures, state and federal compliance, distribution agreements, commercial loans and more

Our law firm also assists clients with a range of other legal matters, including those that involve corporate law, contract law and municipal law.

To arrange a free initial consultation about any area of practice, contact the Clifton office of Peter G. Aziz & Associates LLC. We respond to all calls, emails and letters by the end of each business day.
